p: However, in recent studies on the larvicidal activity of EO components against mosquito species, monoterpenes such as o-cymene, limonene, β-pinene, (-)- β-pinene, α-terpinene, β-terpinene, and thymol, which are compounds found in the sample of T. procumbens, are considered compounds with great larvicidal potential, having action on one or more mosquito species [ 19].
